page-title: On The Wave - 3rd Bachata Kizomba Festival 2-5 May 2014

ivan-salazar-p-1: Choreographer from Cuba, who brought new breezes in Latino dance development in Latvia, because now all skills can be acquired right from the original, just like at Salsa festivals. Instructor perfectly knows Afro and latino dance history and its influence to Latino dance development. Has acquired a professional dancers, choreographers and musicians qualification at Santiago de Cuba, Cuba. Works as a professional dancer and choreographer since year 2008.
